DOC.brief_summary: Tranexamic Acid Use in Elective Cesarean Section for Women With Placenta Previa
DOC.brief_title: Tranexamic Acid Use in Elective Cesarean Section for Women With Placenta Previa
DOC.detailed_description: Tranexamic Acid Use in Elective Cesarean Section for Women With Placenta Previa to detect efficacy of Tranexamic acid in decreasing blood loss
DOC.criteria: Term pregnancy (more than 37 weeks of gestation) Diagnosis of placenta previa was confirmed by ultrasound The patient hemoglobin percentage is more than 10 mg/dl Invading placenta previa diagnosis was confirmed by Doppler ultrasound studies Emergency lower segment cesarean section Associated medical comorbidities
